modmenu.descriptionTranslation.${mod_id}: Client-side Fabric mod that automatically hides HUD elements with customizable conditions and smooth animation.
hudless.modmenu.title: Hudless
hudless.option.enableFade.desc: Apply a fade-out effect to HUD elements when hiding.
hudless.option.visibleTicks.desc: How long (in ticks) the HUD stays visible after a trigger.
hudless.option.hideSpeed.desc: Speed at which HUD elements move off-screen.
hudless.option.hideFadeSpeed.desc: Speed at which HUD elements fade out when hiding.
hudless.option.minY.desc: Lowest Y-offset to which HUD elements can move when hidden.
hudless.option.trigger.hunger.desc: Show the HUD when your hunger level changes.
hudless.option.trigger.health.desc: Show the HUD when your health changes.
hudless.option.trigger.hotbar.desc: Show the HUD when you switch hotbar slots.
hudless.option.trigger.armor.desc: Show the HUD when your armor value changes.
hudless.option.trigger.air_bubbles.desc: Show the HUD when your underwater air bubbles change.
hudless.option.trigger.effects.desc: Show the HUD when your active status effects change.
hudless.option.trigger.mount_health.desc: Show the HUD when your mount’s health changes.
hudless.option.status_bars.desc: Hide the health, hunger, armor and air-bubble bars.
hudless.option.mount_jump.desc: Hide the jump-charge bar when riding a mount.
